QtoSetDef.Name: Qto_PileBaseQuantities
QtoSetDef.Definition: Base quantities that are common to the definition of all occurrences of piles.

QtoDef.Name: Length
QtoDef.Definition: Total length of the pile not taking into account any cut-out's or other processing features.

QtoDef.Name: CrossSectionArea
QtoDef.Definition: Total area of the cross section (or profile) of the pile.

QtoDef.Name: OuterSurfaceArea
QtoDef.Definition: Total area of the extruded surfaces of the pile (not taking into account the end cap areas), normally generated as perimeter * length.

QtoDef.Name: GrossSurfaceArea
QtoDef.Definition: Total area of the pile, normally generated as perimeter * length + 2 * cross section area. It is the sum of OuterSurfaceArea + (2 x CrossSectionArea) and shall only be given, if the OuterSurfaceArea and CrossSectionArea cannot be established separately.

QtoDef.Name: GrossVolume
QtoDef.Definition: Total gross volume of the pile, not taking into account possible processing features (cut-out's, etc.) or openings and recesses.

QtoDef.Name: NetVolume
QtoDef.Definition: Total net volume of the pile, taking into account possible processing features (cut-out's, etc.) or openings and recesses.

QtoDef.Name: GrossWeight
QtoDef.Definition: Total gross weight of the pile without add-on parts, not taking into account possible processing features (cut-out's, etc.) or openings and recesses.

QtoDef.Name: NetWeight
QtoDef.Definition: Total net weight of the pile without add-on parts, taking into account possible processing features (cut-out's, etc.) or openings and recesses.
